options.explain:
Lv. 30 skills increase Lv. 30 skills' cooldown recovery +10% when cast.
- Lv. 30 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Ice skills

Lv. 60 skills increase Lv. 60 skills' cooldown recovery +10% when cast.
- Lv. 60 skills resets this effect at the max stacks when cast.
- Creator: Effect only applied to the Destruction skills

options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px (Cooldown: 3 sec. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.

options.explain:
Incoming Petrification casts the Statue buff instead of Petrification for 60 sec.
- Statue casts Super Armor that lasts for 5 hits.
- Skill Atk. +13% at 25% or higher Physical Def.
- Damage Value +9930 at 25% or higher Magical Def.
- Your Petrification-specific equipment effects are applied during the Statue buff.
options.explainDetail:
Incoming Petrification casts the Statue buff instead of Petrification for 60 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
- Statue casts Super Armor that lasts for 5 hits.
- Skill Atk. +13% at 25% or higher Physical Def.
- Damage Value +9930 at 25% or higher Magical Def.
- Your Petrification-specific equipment effects are applied during the Statue buff. (HP/MP healing effects excluded)

options.explain: Skills with a 40-second or longer cooldown Petrify you and enemies within 400 px for 10 sec.
options.explainDetail: Skills with a 40-second or longer cooldown Petrify you and enemies within 400 px for 10 sec. (Cooldown: 30 sec. This Petrification effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Petrification Tolerance.)

options.explain:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave
options.explainDetail:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05. (Cooldown: 1 sec. Inflicts 6% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shock wave energy is charged every 0.1 sec. after cooldown. (Charged up to 9 times)
- Charging generates bigger shock waves with attacks, increasing Neutral Gauge reduction and shock wave damage +100% per charge.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave (Max Stacks: 30)
- Additional Damage Value Buff stacks +1 per charge

options.explain: Attacks create a 30% chance of applying a randomly selected effect.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 30% chance of applying one of the following 3 effects. (Cooldown: 3 sec. Max Stacks: 1. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Casts Vertical Pillar on a randomly selected enemy in 200 px. Damage Value +7034.
- Casts Vertical Pillar on up to 3 randomly selected enemies in 300 px. Damage Value +7815.
- Casts Vertical Pillar on up to 5 randomly selected enemies in 500 px. Damage Value +8597.
